entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
